trans-unit.source: In order to update the Workflow Accelerator system, you have to replace the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ROOT</kbd> folder in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps</kbd> with the newer version you can find in the extracted directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/webapps</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: In order to update the Workflow Accelerator system, you have to replace the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ROOT</kbd> folder in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps</kbd> with the newer version you can find in the extracted directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/webapps</kbd>.

target.mrk: Um das Workflow Accelerator-System zu aktualisieren, müssen Sie den Ordner <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ROOT</kbd> im Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps</kbd> durch die neuere Version ersetzen, welche sich in dem entpackten Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/webapps</kbd> befindet.

trans-unit.source: Copy the configuration files you have backed up in subsection <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref>back into the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Copy the configuration files you have backed up in subsection <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref>back into the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes</kbd>.

target.mrk: Kopieren Sie die Konfigurationsdateien, die Sie in Abschnitt <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref> gesichert haben, zurück in das Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: If you have been provided with a new <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">license.xml</kbd>, copy the file into <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes</kbd> and replace the existing file. Otherwise, you can keep on using the old <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">license.xml</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: If you have been provided with a new <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">license.xml</kbd>, copy the file into <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes</kbd> and replace the existing file.
Otherwise, you can keep on using the old <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">license.xml</kbd>.

target.mrk: Insofern Sie mit der Aktualisierung eine neue <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">license.xml</kbd> erhalten haben, kopieren Sie diese Datei in das Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes</kbd> und ersetzen die bestehende Datei.
Sollten Sie keine neue <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">license.xml</kbd> erhalten haben, können Sie weiterhin die alte Datei verwenden.

trans-unit.source: If you have installed the Workflow Accelerator Script Engine, you need to update the content of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> directory with the newer version you can find in the extracted directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/script-engine</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: If you have installed the Workflow Accelerator Script Engine, you need to update the content of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> directory with the newer version you can find in the extracted directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/script-engine</kbd>.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie die Workflow Accelerator Script Engine installiert haben, müssen Sie den Inhalt des Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> durch die neuere Version in dem Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/script-engine</kbd> ersetzen.

trans-unit.source: Delete all files in the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Delete all files in the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd>.

target.mrk: Löschen Sie alle Dateien im Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Copy the content of the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/script-engine</kbd> to your <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> directory.

seg-source.mrk: Copy the content of the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/script-engine</kbd> to your <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> directory.

target.mrk: Kopieren Sie den Inhalt des Verzeichnisses <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/script-engine</kbd> in Ihr <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> Verzeichnis.

trans-unit.source: Copy the configuration file <kbd xmlns="">configuration.onpremise.js</kbd> you have backed up in subsection <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref> back into the directory <kbd xmlns="">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Copy the configuration file <kbd xmlns="">configuration.onpremise.js</kbd> you have backed up in subsection <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref> back into the directory <kbd xmlns="">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd>.

target.mrk: Kopieren Sie die Konfigurationsdatei <kbd xmlns="">configuration.onpremise.js</kbd>, die Sie in Abschnitt <MadCap:xref href="backup-configuration-files.htm#Back" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Backup the configuration files </MadCap:xref> gesichert haben, zurück in das Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: If you have installed the Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay, you need to update the content of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail-relay.jar</kbd> file within the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> directory with the newer version you can find in the extracted directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: If you have installed the Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay, you need to update the content of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail-relay.jar</kbd> file within the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> directory with the newer version you can find in the extracted directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay</kbd>.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie das Workflow Accelerator Mail Relay installiert haben, dann müssen Sie die Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mail-relay.jar</kbd> im Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> durch die neuere Version ersetzen, die Sie im extrahierten Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay</kbd> finden.

trans-unit.source: Copy the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay/mail-relay.jar</kbd> to your <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> directory.

seg-source.mrk: Copy the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay/mail-relay.jar</kbd> to your <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd> directory.

target.mrk: Kopieren Sie die Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$WORKFLOW_HOME/mail-relay/mail-relay.jar</kbd> in ihr <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MAIL_RELAY_HOME</kbd>-Verrzeichnis.
